name: Ext_R2_CommunicationRequest_requester
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.CommunicationRequest.requester for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents CommunicationRequest.requester from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CommunicationRequest|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: An individual who requested a communication
element.definition: The responsible person who authorizes this order, e.g. physician. This may be different than the author of the order statement, e.g. clerk, who may have entered the statement into the order entry application.
element.comment: `CommunicationRequest.requester` maps to R4B `CommunicationRequest.requester`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
